title: Chomsky's Academic BULLYING
description:
Is this academic BULLYING???

In a recent episode on my podcast, J.J. Hantsch discussed Noam #Chomsky's influence in #linguistics, suggesting that many academic linguists delay publishing papers until Chomsky is no longer around, fearing his critique. This highlights how power struggles and intolerance for differing ideas can exist even in academia.

As a podcast host, not an academic, I found this insight both intriguing and concerning. 

How can we encourage more open dialogue in academic circles?



#Linguistics #NoamChomsky #AcademicFreedom #IntellectualDiversity #podcasting
